name: CVE-2022-22326
description: IBM Datapower Gateway 10.0.2.0 through 10.0.4.0, 10.0.1.0 through 10.0.1.5, and 2018.4.1.0 through 2018.4.1.18 could allow unauthorized viewing of logs and files due to insufficient authorization checks. IBM X-Force ID: 218856.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:ibm:datapower_gateway:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:ibm:datapower_gateway:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:ibm:datapower_gateway:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:ibm:mq_appliance_m2002_firmware:*:*:*:*:continuous_delivery:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:ibm:mq_appliance_m2002_firmware:*:*:*:*:long_term_support:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:ibm:mq_appliance_m2002:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:ibm:mq_appliance_m2001_firmware:*:*:*:*:continuous_delivery:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:ibm:mq_appliance_m2001_firmware:*:*:*:*:long_term_support:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:ibm:mq_appliance_m2001:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*'))]
